addDefinition

public void addDefinition(java.lang.String definition)
Add a property definition mapping to this schema.

The root's label will be mapped to the tree.

Note that the root must hold a named property definition or an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.

If a property definition tree already exists with the label, an IllegalStateException will be thrown.

Parameters:
definition - The string form of a simple property definition tree for a named property. Note that a simple property definition tree defines a property and its possible parameter sets.

addDefinition

void addDefinition(Tree<PropertyDefinition> def)
Add a property definition mapping to this schema.

The root's label will be mapped to the tree.

Note that the root must hold a named property definition or an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.

If a property definition tree already exists with the label, an IllegalStateException will be thrown.

Parameters:
def - A simple property definition tree for a named property. Note that a simple property definition tree defines a property and its possible parameter sets.

getPropertyDefinitionTree

Tree<PropertyDefinition> getPropertyDefinitionTree(java.lang.String property)
Retrieve the property definition tree having the given label at its root.

Note that the label must be the name of a property without a repeat marker.

Returns:
the property definition tree or null if not found.
